title: Flamtaer bag

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Flamtaer bag is a bag that can store supplies used in the Shades of Mort'ton minigame. It is obtained from any chest (except bronze) in the Shade Catacombs. Players can only own one Flamtaer bag at any given time.

The Flamtaer bag is a bag that can store supplies used in the Shades of Mort'ton minigame. It is obtained from any chest (except bronze) in the Shade Catacombs. Players can only own one Flamtaer bag at any given time.

The Flamtaer bag is able to store up to 60 timber beams, 60 limestone bricks and 500 swamp paste.

On death, the Flamtaer bag is lost along with its contents.

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Despite the newspost introducing the Flamtaer bag, which stated that it could store either timber beams or wooden planks, players are unable to store wooden planks in it. Attempting to do so results in a message in the player's chatbox, saying, "The bag takes timber beams, not planks."

[[File:Flamtaer bag detail.png|left|100px]]
The '''Flamtaer bag''' is a bag that can store supplies used in the [[Shades of Mort'ton (activity)|Shades of Mort'ton]] [[minigame]]. It is obtained from any chest (except bronze) in the [[Shade Catacombs]]. Players can only own one Flamtaer bag at any given time.

The Flamtaer bag is able to store up to 60 [[timber beam]]s, 60 [[limestone brick]]s and 500 [[swamp paste]].

On death, the Flamtaer bag is lost along with its contents.

==Item sources==
{{Drop sources|Flamtaer bag}}

==Trivia==

*Despite the newspost introducing the Flamtaer bag, which stated that it could store either timber beams or wooden [[plank]]s, players are unable to store wooden planks in it. Attempting to do so results in a message in the player's chatbox, saying, "The bag takes timber beams, not planks."
{{Shades of Mort'ton (minigame)}}
